laboratory_examinations.findings: Gallbladder is markedly distended with numerous gallstones. An obstructing stone measuring 14 mm x 15 mm x 14 mm in the gallbladder neck leads to significant distension and mild bile duct compression. Mild upstream intrahepatic biliary ductal dilation noted. Trace gallbladder wall edema present.
30.0 sec (within normal range; reference range 25.0 - 36.5 sec)
